long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Shows a Beautiful Weather Page on your Device or Tablet.

Shows current temperature, feels like, sunset, sunrise, and much more!
Shows a daily weather forecast for 7 days, including high/low temperature,
wind speed and direction, precipitation, humidity, and atmospheric pressure.
Shows hourly data accessed by tapping anywhere on the daily weather page.

The layout is optimized for portrait mode, especially for tablet devices.

Allows you to find your location by keyword or via GPS.
Ability to choose between metric or imperial measurement data.
Optionally allows to display the weather page in full screen mode.
Settings for dimming screen at night in case running on tablet 24/7.

Weather Data is provided by Gismeteo, which is a trademark of MapMakers Ltd.
Weather Data is the property of Gismeteo, and it is their copyrighted material.
